description:
Running stopwatch that measures your step count and pace (pace being the time per 1000 steps) with built-in pedometer, all that without a smartphone!

Precise histogram of pace times, so that you can see exactly what was your peak, mean and rest tempo.

Be free, run like a wind with no device other than your faithful Pebble!

Love it? Please heart it! :)

PS: No tracking to cloud - your data is for your eyes only :).

PPS: Redit thread: http://www.reddit.com/r/pebble/comments/2qrs35/app_steps_standalone_stopwatch_for_runners_with/
